On Fri, 2002-08-16 at 04:28, Angles Puglisi wrote:
> Any sage advice on the most painless way to upgrade from old limbo (.92) to new
> limbo (.93)?

Format and reinstall. There is no supported upgrade path from beta to
beta, or from beta to release.

-- 
Chris Kloiber
